mapper.select: select phone,password,true_name,card_id,bank_card_id,create_time,state from Rider where phone=#{0} and password=#{1}
select count(*) from Rider where phone=#{0}

select s.shop_name qc_shop_name,s.address qc_address,s.longitude qc_longitude,s.latitude qc_latitude,o.shipping_address sc_address,o.longitude sc_longitude,o.latitude sc_latitude,o.order_number from shop s,order_record o where s.shop_id=o.shop_id and s.mark=0
select p.product_name,p.quantity,p.price from order_record r,order_product p where r.id=p.order_id and r.order_number=#{0}

select s.address qh_address,s.longitude qh_longitude,s.latitude qh_latitude,o.shipping_address sh_address,o.longitude sh_longitude,o.latitude sh_latitude,o.order_number,sum(quantity*price) price from shop s,order_record o,order_product p where s.shop_id=o.shop_id and o.id=p.order_id and s.mark=0 GROUP BY o.order_number

select s.address qh_address,s.longitude qh_longitude,s.latitude qh_latitude,o.shipping_address sh_address,o.longitude sh_longitude,o.latitude sh_latitude,o.order_number,sum(quantity*price) price from shop s,order_record o,order_product p where s.shop_id=o.shop_id and o.id=p.order_id and s.mark=0 GROUP BY o.order_number
